pages.terms: Terms of Use: By using our site, you agree to our terms. Home Hotel Casino Contacts Terms & Conditions Welcome to WinWaves, the premier casino-hotel destination in France. Slot machines offer a variety of games, themes and bonus rounds, making them very attractive to players. WinWaves Casino offers a huge selection of slot machines from various manufacturers. Here you will find both classic three-reel slots and the latest video slots with exciting gameplay and a variety of bonus features. Roulette Roulette is a classic game of chance in which players bet on a number or group of numbers, after which the dealer spins the roulette wheel and throws the ball. The winnings are determined by the number or group of numbers on which the ball lands. Roulette is available in both online and offline casinos. WinWaves Casino offers various variants of roulette, including European, American and French. Here you can try your luck and bet on your favorite number or color. Card Games Card games are a broad class of games that use playing cards. They include popular games such as blackjack, poker, baccarat, solitaire and much more. Card games require strategy, skill and luck, which makes them fun for players. WinWaves Casino has tables with card games such as blackjack, baccarat and poker. Here you can take on the dealer or other players and try your hand at strategy and luck. Other Gambling Games Other gambling games may include various types of lotteries, craps, keno, bingo and more. These games are also popular among gamblers and offer a variety of winning opportunities. Additionally, WinWaves Casino offers various gambling games such as Keno, Craps and others. Here everyone will find something to their liking and will be able to experience excitement and adrenaline. 18+ You can only play in our casino if you are 18 years old or older! The comfort and satisfaction of the players, as well as the general atmosphere in the establishment, depend on their professionalism and experience. WinWaves Casino in France employs only the best of the best croupiers who have undergone rigorous selection and training before being given the opportunity to work at the gaming table. pages.policy: Privacy Policy: Your data is safe with us. We respect your privacy. Home Hotel Casino Contacts Privacy Policy At WinWaves Casino-Hotel, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information when you visit our website or use our services. By accessing our website or using our services, you consent to the collection and use of your personal information as described in this Privacy Policy. 1. Information We Collect When you visit our website or use our services, we may collect the following types of information: - Personal Information: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment information when you register an account, make a reservation, or contact us for inquiries or support. - Usage Information: We may collect information about your use of our website and services, such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, and device information. - Cookies: We may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect information about your browsing behavior and preferences. You can adjust your browser settings to disable cookies, but this may affect your ability to use certain features of our website. - Third-Party Information: We may receive information from third parties, such as social media platforms or advertising networks, to enhance our services and marketing activities. 2. How We Use Your Information We may use your personal information for the following purposes: - To provide and improve our services, such as processing reservations, payments, and customer support requests. - To personalize your experience and deliver relevant content and offers based on your preferences. - To communicate with you about promotions, events, and other marketing activities. - To analyze and optimize the performance of our website and services. 3. How We Share Your Information We may share your personal information with third parties for the following purposes: - Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in delivering our services, such as payment processors, marketing agencies, and IT vendors. - Legal Compliance: We may disclose your information as required by law or to protect our rights and interests. - Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred to a new owner or entity. 4. Data Security We take measures to safeguard your personal information and protect it from unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration. We use encryption, firewalls, and other security technologies to secure your data and comply with industry standards. 5. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can update your account settings or contact us to request assistance with your personal data. You also have the right to opt out of receiving marketing communications or cookies. 6. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or regulations. We will notify you of any material changes and obtain your consent if required. 7. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or practices, please contact us at winwaves@gmail.com. Thank you for choosing WinWaves Casino-Hotel. We appreciate your trust and loyalty. Home Hotel Casino Contacts Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions Disclaimer
